message: I'd like to make you a one-time offer on this exceptional product. I believe you'll find it a valuable addition to your collection, and I'm willing to make a deal that benefits both of us. I'm offering it to you for $900,000. This is a fair price, considering the product's worth to you is $1,200,000. I'm confident you'll see the value in this opportunity, and I'm excited to hear your response.
